author: USA TODAY, Ryan W. Miller, USA TODAY
title: Pope Francis leads Christians around the world in Our Father prayer amid coronavirus: We 'beg mercy'
description: Appearing alone, the Vatican Library, Pope Francis recited the Lord's Prayer and asked for prayers for all people affected by the virus.
content:
An epidemiologist answers the biggest questions she's getting about coronavirus.
Wochit
Pope Francis invited Christians around the world to pray together  amid the coronavirus pandemic as he led an Our Father on Wednesday.
